insights_header_subtitle: Insights into our technologies, projects and results.
insights_kiSection_paragraph1: Artificial intelligence is an impressive tool that can speed up certain tasks by a factor of 10. It enables us to offer our tailor-made IT projects extremely efficiently (project duration, costs, etc.). But it does not work without people: creativity, experience, deep understanding of human needs, emotions... None of that can be replaced. In addition, you need experienced people who give the right instructions (prompts) to AI models and control their output. Sometimes AI delivers things you did not ask for (hallucinations) or results with serious errors. Even if many models can now create entire applications with a single prompt, a truly perfect result still requires a human expert.
insights_kiSection_paragraph2: Beyond prompt and context engineering (how can I best feed an AI so that exactly what I want comes out?), there are many other use cases where AI usage - in one form or another - is obvious: chatbots, AI agents, AI workflows, AI-enhanced automations, content creation, personal assistants, etc.
insights_kiSection_paragraph3: We discovered n8n as our automation platform. It allows us to implement scenarios from all areas of AI simply and efficiently. In addition to individual AI consulting services, we also offer the development of specialized agents and workflows that help you achieve your business goals and save costs. For our AI projects (and sometimes our custom development work), the standardized project process cannot be applied 100%. Project timelines are usually somewhat longer and closer coordination is required. And yet the unique raspb approach also delivers unique efficiency here. Results from AI projects are available much earlier than with other providers.
insights_meta_description: Insights into our technologies, projects and results.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph1: Your IT project starts directly on our website: the project configurator lets you describe your vision and lays the foundation for our collaboration. To use the configurator in full, all you need is a basic account – your email address is enough. Your configured project then appears in your personal dashboard, where you can refine it and submit it to us with a single click. At the same time you receive an email with all the details and can place your official order right away – that's where the journey begins.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph2: As soon as your order is in, we dive straight into concept development and build a first prototype. For every project we set up a dedicated mailbox at @raspb.de that is used for all relevant accounts; you can access it conveniently via browser or webmail. We create a GitHub repository for your code and set up a dedicated site on Netlify – depending on the project type complemented by accounts at Hygraph and Auth0, which you typically access via SSO through GitHub.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph3: We sharpen your vision together if needed in short workshops or compact web sessions. Our goal is a lean, efficient process without unnecessary, time-consuming meetings. The information from the configurator combined with our extensive project experience enables us to understand and implement your idea precisely without countless alignment loops. Should you have questions or want additional exchange between configuration and commissioning, we are always available – but always with a focus on a lean and mutually beneficial workflow.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph4: Throughout the development phase you have full access to all systems at all times. We build your project in the dedicated GitHub repository and publish ongoing results via a temporary .netlify.app address. You receive all credentials and are kept informed about every relevant step both in your dashboard and by email. For CMS projects we align the data model and special requirements with you in a few focused iterations, while straightforward websites typically need no additional rounds. You usually receive a first prototype within a few days; for complex applications or custom developments it may take a little longer until the first prototype is ready.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph5: In the next step you take your time to test the prototype and give us your feedback. Through the dashboard you can add further project artefacts at any time and actively shape the direction of development. Based on your feedback we move into revision and fine-tuning until, within a few more days, a go-live-ready version is in place. In agreement with you we publish the solution under your desired domain, alternatively deliver the code to you, or transfer the application to your target environment – at that point the project is officially complete.
insights_projectInsights_paragraph6: Thanks to our modular and extensible architecture, this is rarely the end – more often it marks the beginning of further expansion stages. Your solution can grow at any time with new features, integrations, or projects – and that is exactly what our approach is designed for.
insights_projectInsights_titleFirst: How does a typical project at
insights_showcase_description: raspb is brand new and has not yet had the full opportunity to demonstrate its innovative power. The unique combination of proven modules, AI-supported agile development in a controlled environment (a perfectly coordinated tech stack) makes raspb projects something truly special. The sheer variety of possibilities makes it difficult to describe or showcase a typical raspb project.
insights_showcase_description2: Nevertheless, there are many satisfied clients who have collaborated with me on side-projects in the past. Solutions that run smoothly, reliably and with minimal maintenance – some of them for many years. I would like to present the projects that were built within the same technical framework (before the AI accelerator was introduced): Node.js LTS + SvelteKit + TailwindCSS + daisyUI (some also with Netlify, Hygraph and Auth0). Projects I realized as a solo developer alongside my main job. The tech stack and the foundation have proven themselves demonstrably across multiple projects and have been gradually refined towards our goals.

insights_techInsights_title: raspb - a harmonious system for your business success
insights_webtechnologien_absatz1: Jamstack stands for JavaScript, APIs and Markup and represents a modern architecture for web development. This technology enables us to build extremely fast, secure and scalable websites and web applications that deliver an exceptional user experience.
insights_webtechnologien_absatz2: The core of the Jamstack approach lies in pre-generation of content. Instead of generating pages dynamically on each request, all pages are generated at build time and delivered via a Content Delivery Network (CDN). This results in lightning-fast load times and improved performance. There are additional benefits as well.
insights_webtechnologien_absatz3: By decoupling frontend and backend, we can flexibly choose the best tools for each area. The frontend is delivered as static files, while dynamic functions are implemented via APIs. This architecture offers several decisive advantages:
insights_webtechnologien_absatz4:
Our Jamstack setup consists of modern and innovative tools and technologies that have proven themselves and are perfectly coordinated. A Node.js frontend application usually forms the foundation. Enriched with frameworks like Svelte/SvelteKit, TailwindCSS or DaisyUI and other npm packages, we create a frontend with endless possibilities.

We are not locked into a rigid construct, but can respond flexibly to integration requests or other technology questions. Almost anything is possible... Furthermore, we rely on TypeScript for type-safe programming and Netlify for deployment and hosting. This combination - supported by AI tools - enables us to develop robust and maintainable web applications optimized for both developers and end users.
insights_webtechnologien_absatz5: Headless CMS integration via GraphQL APIs enables our customers to manage content easily while the technical complexity remains hidden in the background. This lets you focus on your business while we ensure a technically flawless and future-proof solution.
insights_webtechnologien_subtitle: We have developed our own technology stack based on Jamstack that makes everything simpler, faster and more efficient without having to accept limitations.
insights_webtechnologien_vorteile_entwic: Developer friendliness: Modern tools and workflows + dynamic community
insights_webtechnologien_vorteile_kosten: Cost efficiency: Reduced development, hosting and maintenance costs
insights_webtechnologien_vorteile_perfor: Performance: Global CDN distribution + pre-rendered markup for minimal load times
insights_webtechnologien_vorteile_sicher: Security: Less attack surface through static files + no classic server
insights_webtechnologien_vorteile_skalie: Scalability (traffic): Automatic scaling without server administration (load balancing)
Scalability (app): Easy scaling of your application or website
insights_showcase_modal_wunschwurm_subti: Social Platform · Complex Web Application · Freestyle Development
insights_showcase_modal_wunschwurm_descr: Wunschwurm is more than a website – it is a fully-fledged platform for a social initiative in Mainz. Wishes from children, homeless people and others in need are digitised and made accessible to wish-granters in a catalogue. Charities, admins, drop-off points, delivery staff and donors all have their own individual role and personalised dashboard. A perfect interplay of all technologies, built 100% by hand, grown over months and years.
insights_showcase_modal_wunschwurm_highl: Pixel-perfect custom design – executed down to the smallest detail, including an animated loading animation (spinning worm)
Multi-level role & user management (Auth0): charities, admins, delivery staff, drop-off points and wish-granters
Content management & document storage for wish items including image uploads (Hygraph)
Interactive map of all charities & collection points in Mainz (Mapbox)
Running stably for 4+ years – operating costs under €20/month
Architecture 100% self-designed – 80% of implementation by myself, additional developers guided and integrated
insights_showcase_modal_schahnheim_descr: A fresh digital presence for the local sports club in the neighbouring village – existing colours, logo and style were modernised and refined. Each department independently manages its own section with text, images and even video. One brief onboarding session was all it took to hand content management fully over to the club.
insights_showcase_modal_schahnheim_highl: CMS setup with Hygraph: each department independently manages text, images & video (incl. YouTube integration)
Password-protected internal area for messages & club documents
Running costs: just a few euros per month for the domain
insights_showcase_modal_procivibus_subti: Corporate Website · LinkedIn Integration · Full-Service Fixed Price
insights_showcase_modal_procivibus_descr: Corporate excellence for a Frankfurt foundation – implemented pixel-perfectly to specification. Before the actual build came an intensive consulting and concept phase in which we worked together to define exactly what was needed. The result: a modern, functional and impressive online presence.
insights_showcase_modal_procivibus_highl: Pixel-perfect design implementation to client specification (intensive consulting & concept phase upfront)
Social media integration: customised LinkedIn feed directly on the homepage (Elfsight)
Contact form with automated email flow and notifications
Full-service: implementation, consulting & administration as a fixed-price project
insights_showcase_modal_schumachergienow: Law Firm Website · WordPress Migration · Full-Service Fixed Price

A modern relaunch for a law firm in Frankfurt – replacing a high-maintenance WordPress site. Content and images were fully scraped and the entire migration managed end-to-end. Existing content was modernised, optimised and extended with new features.
Complete WordPress migration: content scraping, image migration & full transition management
New slider/carousel with extensive image preparation (format conversion was part of the service package)
Contact form with process flow and automated email notifications
Full-service: implementation, consulting & administration as a fixed-price project
insights_showcase_modal_mgvhahnheim_desc: A modern, fast and secure content site – built as a favour in a single Saturday afternoon from zero to live. Including server configuration, routing and deployment. No concept, no design, no specific requirements – and still a solid, immediately usable result.
insights_showcase_modal_mgvhahnheim_high: 4 content pages with texts & images plus a complete contact form
From zero to live within a few hours – including server config, routing & deployment
No upfront concept, no design, no specific brief – and still a solid, usable outcome
Proof: minimal overhead, maximum agility with the proven tech stack
insights_showcase_modal_strateco_subtitl: Website Relaunch · Multilingual · CMS · Work in Progress
insights_showcase_modal_strateco_descrip: A comprehensive relaunch of a corporate website that had grown over more than 10 years. Over 150 pages in total (approx. 75–78 per language in German and English) are being inventoried, modernised step by step and migrated into a flexible CMS. The project runs in phases – without time pressure, but with a clear direction.
insights_showcase_modal_strateco_highlig: Inventory & structured content scraping of 150+ pages (approx. 75–78 per language, DE & EN)
Multilingual support (German & English) planned from the ground up
CMS-backed content management with Hygraph for easy content maintenance
Phased approach: solid foundation first, then step-by-step expansion
Optimised header & footer – newly conceived and enriched with proven content
